channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Nevada lithium mine will crush rare plant habitat US said is critical to its survival, lawsuit says
item.description: Conservationists and a Native American tribe are suing to block a Nevada lithium mine they say will drive an endangered wildflower to extinction, disrupt groundwater flows and threaten cultural resources.

item.title: Arkansas chief justice election won’t change conservative tilt of court, but will make history
item.description: The winner of Arkansas’ race for state Supreme Court chief justice won’t change the conservative majority of a court that has been targeted by Republican groups in recent elections.

item.title: Trial in 2017 killings of 2 teenage girls in Indiana reaches midway point as prosecution rests
item.description: The trial of a man accused of killing two teenage girls in a small Indiana community has passed its midway point following more than two weeks of testimony about the 2017 killings.
